name: Attack of Extra Terrestrial Life
description:
You're a space commander in a combat simulation preparing to survive the lethal maneuvers of enemy aliens! Kill all of the enemies on screen to win! Hearts heal you, the bullet gives you a multishot, and whenever you get a hit, a shield will appear that gives you invincibility!

Controls:

AWSD/Arrow keys - Move

Space/Left Ctrl/Left Click - Fire

Created by:

Dmytro Nebesh

Sampson Williford

skarrx24#2015
